relating to boys or girls between the ages of about nine and twelve: preteen fashions Her music is popular with preteen girls.
More examplesFewer examplesThe movie is certainly aimed at teen to preteen audiences.He is a devoted dad with a preteen daughter.The band members have known one another since their pre-teen days.
